EmailTemplate.name: HWBR-202305-CHTPA-CC-Reputation.Invite #3 (Last chance to register: Virtual Part
EmailTemplate.subject: Last chance to register: Virtual Partner Summit
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{{my.Event-Type}} {{my.Event-Title}} {{my.Event-Day:default=edit me}}, {{my.Event-Date:default=edit me}} {{my.Event-Time:default=edit me}} As more virtual care solutions flood the market, help your clients make the right choice with a whole-person approach that’s both effective and easy to manage. Join our Virtual Partner Summit <[[https://attendee.gotowebinar.com/register/2360610113965845851]]> for four sessions packed with insights you can use to support your clients’ success: • The significance of virtual care in an evolving healthcare landscape: See the trends driving employers’ strategic healthcare decisions • Understanding the power of a multi-program chronic condition solution: Demos and tips on boosting engagement and enrollment • The evolution of mental healthcare delivery: Explore the value of connecting mental and physical healthcare
• Virtual primary care misconceptions: Strategies for helping employers evaluate solutions based on consumer expectations and costs About Teladoc Health: Teladoc Health is transforming the healthcare experience and empowering people everywhere to live healthier lives. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages more than a decade of expertise and data-driven insights to meet the growing virtual care needs of consumers and healthcare professionals. Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> | Privacy <[[https://www.teladochealth.com/legal/privacy-policy]]> | Legal notice <[[https://www.teladochealth.com/legal/legal-disclaimer]]> © Teladoc Health, Inc. All rights reserved. 2 Manhattanville Road, Purchase NY, 10577.
